Cameron Akker

Recently graduated engineer and CAPM-certified technical project manager. Experience with engineering and software project management (Apple and Moved) and hardware engineering and global supply chain management (Formlabs).

Hackathon veteran who has attended 20+ hackathon events, and organized 7 hackathons including VHacks, the first ever hackathon at the Vatican.
